DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1860 year 2 . No known medical illness require pharmacotherapy 3 . Not mineral vitamin supplement last 3 month 1 . Subjects require prompt initiation pharmacotherapy , incidentally discover diabetes mellitus hypertension . 2 . Previous administration glucocorticoid , retinoic acid derivative , insulin sensitizer precede 3 month . 3 . Bariatric surgery liposuction 4 .
